item.title: Creating a development blog
item.description: Welcome to the inaugural post of Organizing Chaos! I'm the type of person who loves to tinker with new pieces of technology. Recently, I've been experimenting with a few different technical ideas that I thought were worth writing about (stay tuned for future posts ðŸ˜‰), so naturally I started to get excited about the prospect of setting up a personal development blog for myself. After a weekend of research and experimentation, I've arrived at a very simple (yet effective!
